txt.en: Talk to Hadorion in the Lower Ward

'We've made it to Umbar, [placeholder].

'I tracked Kh창shap all the way from the Langstrand through the Shield Isles. I believe he's made landfall here in Umbar, but we are among his cohorts so we must tread carefully. I have a plan to draw him out of hiding.

'What's more important to a Corsair and a cutthroat? Reputation. If we call into question that very reputation, they are bound to come forth in defence of it. We shall spread rumours of ill-gotten gains. Paint him as a betrayer to his people. We don't need anyone but Kh창shap himself to believe in these rumours... and something tells me he will.'
There hang posters all around the Lower Ward of the city. This should create a stir amongst the residents. You should tell Hadorion.\n\nHadorion can be found in the Lower Ward.
Hadorion plans to spread wild rumours about Kh창shap in order to draw him out. The first step is to place these posters around the city to publicly paint a target on his back.
Hadorion has been pursuing a Corsair by the name of Kh창shap since he showed in Anfalas. His pursuit has led him to the city of Umbar.

'Tongues should start flapping. Whether or not it is believable should not matter.\n\n'There exists within Umbar a healthy smattering of different allegiances. Now we wait for it to spread like a contagion.'
